channel.title: Price-Fixing Charges on FinanClub

item.title: TEVA
item.description: score:203 Chances: Teva stock pops on Q2 results, CEO sees ‘significant’ potential for trio of branded drugs Teva’s 3rd interim analysis of PEARL real-world study on AJOVY® (fremanezumab) reveals sustained long-term effectiveness in reducing frequency, duration, and severity of attacks in patients with chronic and episodic migraine Teva Reaches Agreement With Kentucky to Settle the State’s Price Fixing Claims Risks: Teva to Pay $225 Million to Settle Price-Fixing Charges (Revised) Teva Agrees to Pay $225 Million to Settle Price-Fixing Charges Teva considers sale of its active ingredients unit: Bloomberg Score:203 investment score = chances characters count - risks characters count
